returnValues.name: angle
returnValues.description: The current rotation angle of the screen in degrees (0, 90, 180, or 270).

returnValues.name: isSupported
returnValues.description: Indicates if the Screen Orientation API is available in the current browser/device.

returnValues.name: lock
returnValues.description: Function to lock the screen to a specific orientation (e.g., 'landscape' or 'portrait').

returnValues.name: unlock
returnValues.description: Function to release a previously applied orientation lock.
